title: Disable main menu pictures?
body: Is there a way to disable the pictures on the main menu? I dont like those serious looking faces. Its league of legends why do they look so serious. If this was HoN it would be more appropriate.

replies.body: Yeah the gamer faces on the menu after logging in.
I thought you were talking about the website, with those serious gamers faces. I admit I don't really like seeing them everywhere myself but you might be talking about something else

The main menu or the login screen? The login screen has 2 checkboxes in the bottom left to disable animations and sound, but for the main screen after you've logged in, you could hit the "profile" button and that might be the fix you're looking for.
